title: PBE Acceptance
body: Today marks the 1 year and 6 months that I've waited to get into the PBE. A buddy of mine submitted his application 2 weeks after me. He was accepted a week later. Sooooo...FML I guess.

replies.body: This certainly isn't the best anniversary to commemorate, but we really have no way to expedite applications.  I'm not sure why some players may be selected over others, beyond requirements provided in our[ PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Fingers crossed for you, good luck!
